name: juristec-monorepo
description: Online Legal Office Platform - Comprehensive Testing & Quality

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.audit:security: npm run audit:backend && npm run audit:frontend
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run setup:hooks
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/next-app && npm install && cd ../websocket-service-nest && npm install
scripts.setup:hooks: husky install || echo 'Husky not available, skipping hooks setup'
